name: Межгалактический Отряд Волшебников (EN-RU)
description:
Hey there, this translation was brought to you by three students from a university in Samara called IMI. From the linguistics branch, if you couldn't tell.

We just decided to get together and participate in this game localization jam, since it honestly just seemed really fun and it's always great to get some legitimate translation experience.

We get a kick out of translating games, and we hope you'll share at least a smidgeon of the fun we had making it by playing it.
